Name: HorD: High or Die
About the game: HorD is an arcady highscore-driven Twin Stick Shooter set in a dystopian Drug Film universe. The player is orderd by the ominous 'Chick' to collect samples of a new drug named FLOW, but instead ends up using it, creating a drug-induced gorefest and fighting his own nightmares. Fast-paced Single-player action experience. 3 different maps (Warehouse, Harbour, Disco) 5 different enemy types that will hunt you down mercilessly. Get better and attain even higher scores. FLOWMOTION: Enhance your playthrough with the FLOW-induced disco rampage! Controller Support for the Xbox Controller for Windows. This project was created by students in approximately 3 months in cooperation with the Games Academy Berlin.
